title: How social media platforms will detect underage users after ban kicks in
description: Platforms will analyse user activity to detect underage users when Australia's social media ban for under-16s begins on December 10. See the full story on 7NEWS.com.au #socialmedia #socialmediaban #tech #kids #teens

title: EXCLUSIVE: PM talks taking on tech titans amid social media ban
description: In a 7NEWS exclusive interview, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese sits down with Chief Political Editor Mark Riley to discuss his government taking on tech giants amid the under-16 social media ban, rolling out on December 10.   Albanese says he doesn't feel pressure but a responsibility for the parents who have lost their kids to bullying on social media. Watch 7NEWS at 6pm for the next report in our special six-part series on this world-first policy. #socialmedia #socialmediaban #exclusive #auspol #AnthonyAlbanese

title: Grave fears for missing teen swept out to sea during schoolies trip
description: A search effort is underway for an 18-year-old after he was swept out to sea at South West Rocks on the New South Wales mid-north Coast during a schoolies trip. #missingswimmer #search #emergency #swimmer #beach

title: Alleged healthcare CEO killer Luigi Mangione fronts court
description: Accused healthcare CEO killer Luigi Mangione has appeared in court for a pretrial hearing in New York. #luigimangione #healthcareceo #newyork #hearing #court

title: Teens flee to new apps before social media ban | 7NEWS
description: Australia's social media age ban takes effect on December 10, requiring platforms to block users under 16 from accessing social media apps. Teenagers are migrating to lesser-known apps like Yope and Lemon8, though these platforms will also be subject to the same restrictions under eSafety rules if they primarily involve sharing posts, pictures and videos. The implementation raises concerns about age verification technology and potential scammer exploitation through fake age verification prompts targeting personal information. title: E-bike rider killed in collision with garbage truck in Ultimo, Sydney
description: An e-bike rider has been killed in a collision with a garbage truck at Ultimo near Sydney's Central Station. #ebike #garbagetruck #crash #ultimo #sydney

title: Teenagers paid thousands of dollars for "post and boast" crimes, NSW Police say
description: Teenagers are being paid thousands of dollars to film their violent crimes as "proof" for the people who hire them, according to NSW Police. #postandboast #crime #attack #police #nswpolice

title: 'Conducted in self-defense' Trump administration says the double tap strikes were lawful | 7NEWS
description: The Trump administration conducted strikes against boats suspected of carrying drugs from Venezuela, with over 80 people killed across almost two dozen attacks over three months. Controversy surrounds the first strike on September 2nd, with questions about whether Defence Secretary Hegseth ordered a second strike to kill survivors, which the administration denies. title: Police crack down on illegal, high-powered e-bikes ahead of Christmas
description: Parents looking to buy their children an e-bike for Christmas are being urged to choose carefully as police crack down on illegal high-powered e-bikes. #ebike #electricbike #electric #ev #police

title: Queensland's newest motorway opens
description: Queensland's newest motorway is officially open to the public. Stage one of the $3.4 billion Coomera Connector project expects to carry 57,000 drivers using the 4km road between Brisbane and the Gold Coast each day. #Motorway #GoldCoast #CoomeraConnector #Queensland
